title: Tony Angelo (Hot Rod Garage)
description:
Tony Angelo might have the coolest origin story in automotive media. He learned to wrench on an RX-7, then he was a driver in the very first season of Formula Drift, and now you he's the host of MotorTrend's "Hot Rod Garage" alongside Lucky Costa. Tony has built some CRAZY stuff on that show including a Jaguar drag car, a twin-engined AWD Impala SS, and a badass '70 Cuda drift car. He has amazing stories that you just have to hear. 

Watch his channel here: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC9yHbzcmcVTeYvczQAOyjfQ

 

Go to https://www.HelloFresh.com/smokingtire12 and use code smokingtire12 for 12 free meals, including free shipping!
